	Strong attention to detail, organizational, and analytical skills.
	Good communication skills with the ability to work independently and in a team.
	Integrity, accountability, and a proactive attitude toward financial management.

Female Accountant Job at HTSF Global Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        HTSF Global Nigeria Limited is an integrated agribusiness and e-commerce company committed to advancing food security and sustainable agriculture in Nigeria. Our operations span across livestock and crop production, complemented by a robust e-commerce platform that connects farmers with high-quality agricultural inputs. In addition, HTSF Global runs a dedicated grocery e-commerce and logistics arm that provides efficient business-to-business (B2B) delivery solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Accountant

Job Location: Ile Ife, Osun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	We are urgently seeking a detail-oriented Female Accountant to manage our company’s financial records and ensure accurate tracking of all income and expenditure.
	This role involves bookkeeping, preparing financial reports, monitoring cash flow, and supporting management in making informed financial decisions.


Key Responsibilities


	Record and maintain accurate bookkeeping of all farm financial transactions (inflows and outflows).
	Monitor daily expenses, purchases, and sales to ensure accountability.
	Prepare weekly and monthly financial reports for management review.
	Reconcile bank statements, petty cash, and other financial accounts.
	Assist in preparing budgets, forecasts, and financial planning for farm operations.
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards, company policies, and relevant regulations.
	Support procurement and inventory management with financial record-keeping.


Requirements / Education


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Must be based in or willing to work in Ile Ife
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in accounting, bookkeeping, or financial management (agricultural or SME setting is an advantage).
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, Excel).
	Strong attention to detail, organizational, and analytical skills.
	Good communication skills with the ability to work independently and in a team.
	Integrity, accountability, and a proactive attitude toward financial management.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

  "description": "American Open University Nigeria is not merely a new university; it is a transformative, industry-engaged, and competency-based institution designed to redefine higher education and prepare students for the future of work. Our mission is to empower students to learn locally and earn globally. Through our custom-built enterprise applications and strategic partnerships with tech giants like Google, Cisco, and Microsoft, we provide a learning experience on a par with the world&#39;s leading universities.&nbsp;

Applications are invited from visionary builders and transformative leaders to join our senior management team in the capacity below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Head of IT

Job Location:&nbsp;Bodija, Ibadan - Oyo

Your Mission


	Architect and lead a world-class digital ecosystem that is the foundation of our university.
	You will drive our digital transformation, ensuring our custom enterprise applications, LMS, and IT infrastructure deliver a seamless, secure, and globally competitive user experience.&nbsp;


Your Profile


	Master&#39;s in IT or a related field, 10+ years of strategic IT leadership, and key industry certifications (e.g., CISSP, PMP, ITIL).
	You must be an expert in ODeL platforms and have a proven record of leading tech initiatives in a complex, global-facing organization.


Core Requirements:


	Tech-Savvy &amp; Digitally Fluent: You must be proficient in leveraging technology to drive efficiency and innovation. Hands-on experience with enterprise applications (like ERPs, LMS) is essential.
	Global Mindset: You will contribute to an environment that opens global advantages to our students and staff, preparing them for international careers and collaboration.
	Commitment to Global Best Practices: You must have a deep understanding of the standards and experiences obtainable in leading global universities to support our diverse and international student body.
	Deep Industry Knowledge: Your expertise will be critical in shaping ourcompetency-based curriculum and fostering the industry engagement that defines our educational model.
	Recognized Industry Certifications: In addition to academic qualifications, relevant professional and industry certifications are required to demonstrate your commitment to applied excellence.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;CV, a cover letter detailing their vision for the role, and proof of relevant industry certifications to:&nbsp;careers@aouniversity.org&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Head of IT Job at American Open University Nigeria




        
    

        
        American Open University Nigeria is not merely a new university; it is a transformative, industry-engaged, and competency-based institution designed to redefine higher education and prepare students for the future of work. Our mission is to empower students to learn locally and earn globally. Through our custom-built enterprise applications and strategic partnerships with tech giants like Google, Cisco, and Microsoft, we provide a learning experience on a par with the world's leading universities. 

Applications are invited from visionary builders and transformative leaders to join our senior management team in the capacity below:

Job Position: Head of IT

Job Location: Bodija, Ibadan - Oyo
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Your Mission


	Architect and lead a world-class digital ecosystem that is the foundation of our university.
	You will drive our digital transformation, ensuring our custom enterprise applications, LMS, and IT infrastructure deliver a seamless, secure, and globally competitive user experience. 


Your Profile


	Master's in IT or a related field, 10+ years of strategic IT leadership, and key industry certifications (e.g., CISSP, PMP, ITIL).
	You must be an expert in ODeL platforms and have a proven record of leading tech initiatives in a complex, global-facing organization.


Core Requirements:


	Tech-Savvy & Digitally Fluent: You must be proficient in leveraging technology to drive efficiency and innovation. Hands-on experience with enterprise applications (like ERPs, LMS) is essential.
	Global Mindset: You will contribute to an environment that opens global advantages to our students and staff, preparing them for international careers and collaboration.
	Commitment to Global Best Practices: You must have a deep understanding of the standards and experiences obtainable in leading global universities to support our diverse and international student body.
	Deep Industry Knowledge: Your expertise will be critical in shaping ourcompetency-based curriculum and fostering the industry engagement that defines our educational model.
	Recognized Industry Certifications: In addition to academic qualifications, relevant professional and industry certifications are required to demonstrate your commitment to applied excellence.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, a cover letter detailing their vision for the role, and proof of relevant industry certifications to: careers@aouniversity.org using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you are a builder with a global mindset and a passion for technology-driven education, we invite you to join us.
